name: admin.auth.policy.removeEntities
desc: Remove specified entities from a specified authentication policy.

entity_ids.desc: Encoded IDs of the entities you'd like to remove from the policy.

entity_type.desc: The type of entity to assign to the policy. Currently, `USER` is supported.

policy_name.desc: The name of the policy to remove entities from. Currently, `email_password` is the only policy that may be used with this method.

errors.entity_not_found: At least one `entity_id` was not found
errors.feature_not_enabled: This method is only available to Enterprise customers.
errors.internal_error: There was an internal error processing this requestâ€”please retry.
errors.invalid_arguments: Required arguments either were not provided or contain invalid values.
errors.invalid_auth: The provided token doesn't have access to this endpoint.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by Org Owners and Admins.
errors.ratelimited: The rate limit for this endpoint has been reached.
